title: Kylie Jenner crops up on ex Travis Scott's Instagram sparking reconciliation rumour
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Following reports of their break-up last month, it seems Travis Scott and Kylie Jenner couldn't keep apart for too long.

Eagle-eyed fans claimed to have spotted the Lip Kit mogul in Travis' Instagram story.

The rapper shared an adorable video of daughter Stormi dancing with what sounds like Kylie's voice in the background.

"Is that Daddy Stormi?" the 22-year-old can be heard asking.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

A hand then reaches in to shot as the voice warns: "Don't pause it."

Fans immediately went wild for the cute video and speculated if it meant the two stars could be getting back together.

E! News reports that Travis, Kylie and Stormi all spent a Sunday together at Kylie's mansion in Calabasas.

"They got along well and were so happy being a family with Stormi,” a source says. “It looked like nothing has changed with them."

(Image: Getty Images for The Met Museum/)

It was first reported that the couple of two years were taking a break from their relationship at the end of September.

Sources told TMZ that the relationship had cooled since they were last seen together in public, at the premiere of Scott's documentary, 'Look Mom, I Can Fly', in Santa Monica on August 27.

It is believed that the pair had been trying to make the relationship work for a while, but it was decided a few weeks ago that they should go their separate ways.

(Image: DPA/PA Images)

Since then Kylie was linked to her boyfriend before Travis, rapper Tyga. Kylie was pictured heading to a recording studio where Travis was at before attending the same nightclub as him days later.

But the reality star hit back at any any romance rumours in a fiery post on Twitter .

(Image: Instagram)

"The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is," she wrote. “There was no ‘2 a.m. date with Tyga.’ You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.”

She went on: "Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! Our friendship and our daughter is priority."
description: The couple are still on a break but sources say they're enjoying hanging out together
authors: Getty Images For The Met Museum
